sentences.english: It was a picture of a boa constrictor digesting an elephant.
sentences.chinese: 仍是一幅大象正在大蟒蛇肚子里消化的画。

sentences.english: The most amazing part is the python in the giant plastic box.
sentences.chinese: 其中最惊人不过于在大塑胶盒中的蟒蛇。

sentences.english: In South America, live anaconda and boa constrictor.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲，活蟒蛇和蟒蛇。

sentences.english: In South America, live anaconda and boa constrictor.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲，活蟒蛇和蟒蛇。

sentences.english: Serpent blood spurted through the air, and in a minute, the huge python was dead.
sentences.chinese: 蛇血在空中喷射出来，很快，大蟒蛇就死了。

sentences.english: A boa constrictor is a very dangerous creature, and an elephant is very cumbersome.
sentences.chinese: 大蟒蛇很危险，大象又十分的笨重。

sentences.english: Kingsnakes are a group of beautiful constrictors found in many parts of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 王蛇是一群在美国很多地方都有发现的美丽蟒蛇。

sentences.english: When day appeared the serpents retired, and I came out of the cave trembling.
sentences.chinese: 当天亮时蟒蛇回去休息了，我颤抖的从山洞出来。

sentences.english: When the python attaked it's owner, dud the owner survive? No.
sentences.chinese: 蟒蛇的主子有没有活下来？没有。

sentences.english: A boa constrictor squeezes its victims to death.
He opened up a cage and lifted out a 6ft python.
sentences.chinese: 他打开笼子，拎出一条6英尺长的蟒蛇。

sentences.english: On the evening before, in the darkness,the barricade had been approached silently, as by a boa.
sentences.chinese: 昨夜在黑暗中，街垒好象被一条蟒蛇悄悄地靠近了。

sentences.english: While in Florida, there are alligators on the fairways and boa constrictors in the suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 佛罗里达州有在高尔夫球场的鳄鱼和市郊的蟒蛇。

sentences.english: The first show was Python cockfighting.
sentences.chinese: 第一个表演是蟒蛇斗鸡。

sentences.english: Operation Anaconda's now in its second week.
sentences.chinese: 蟒蛇行动现在已进行到第二周。

definition: lizard/common spoken equivalent of 蜥蜴[xi1 yi4]
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
